visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should represent monthly average temperatures for a year. Custom colors should be used for the series, and additional configurations should include chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart with a title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart type is set to 'spline', and the background color is light gray. The chart has custom margins to ensure adequate spacing around the chart area. The x-axis categories represent the months of the year, and the y-axis title indicates the temperature in degrees Celsius. Both axes have styled labels with a specified color and font size. The data series represents monthly average temperatures, with a custom color applied to the series. The legend is enabled and styled with a specific color and font size. Overall, this configuration ensures a visually appealing and informative chart.
